name: SacriLoop
description:
A game where you're trying to one turn kill a boss, with the help of cards that let you use an effect again.

///GAMEPLAY///

There are 4 different cards that have different effect when placed:

-COPY: Copy the attack of one of the monster on the field.

-ATK: Raise the attack of one the monster on the field by 1.

-REDO: Redo the last effect, unless its copy in that case it raises the attack of one of your monster by 1. You cant place another redo right after putting a redo on the field.

-DRAW: Draw a card.

If a monster is taking some place for nothing you can sacrifice it by dropping the knife on top of the monster. Each card will give you 1 blood tear when stabbed.

You can draw 1 card with 2 blood tears.

After gathering more than 30 damage total, press "battle" and the win is yours.
